import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { OfferView } from "../catalog/OfferView"; import OfferService from "../../services/offer.service"; export const Search = () => { const [offers, setOffers] = useState([]); const onSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { vehicleIdentificationNumber, model } = e.target; const data = { model, vehicleIdentificationNumber, }; OfferService.searchOffer(data).then((offer) => setOffers(offer.data)); }; return (
An Easier way to find your Housing
  • Rural
  • Urban
  • All
{offers.map((offer) => ( ))}
); };
